short_summary: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below. The delivery is requested at the depots named as soon as possible.

full_summary:
### Aviation Replacement Parts
#### Request for Proposal

**Tender Reference Number**: PW-22-01003660
**Solicitation Number**: W8485-237163/B
**Publication Date**: August 8, 2022
**Tender Closing Date**: August 23, 2022, at 2:00 p.m. (EST)

As part of its procurement process, the Department of National Defence (DND) invites businesses to submit proposals for the supply of specific aviation replacement parts. The description of the procurement follows.

### Procurement Description

The DND seeks proposals for the supply of:

* Seal assembly, shaft, spring-loaded (Item 1)
	+ Part No.: MSE80K-300055
	+ GSIN: 4320
	+ NSN: 4320-01-584-1806
	+ Quantity: 100 units per delivery
	+ Unit of issue: Each
	+ Delivery to: 25 Canadian Forces Supply Depot (CFSD) Montreal

The DND also invites submitters to indicate any equivalent or replacement products with the respective part number and Canadian Commercial Product Identification Code (EEPO).

The procurement is open to Canadian businesses, and the purchase will be governed by the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).  

### Contact Information

For inquiries or questions, please contact:

* Steve Duval Urbain, Defence Procurement Agency representative
* Contact information:
	+ Email: [steve.duvalurbain@forces.gc.ca](mailto:steve.duvalurbain@forces.gc.ca)
	+ Phone: 999-999-9999

Please note that all correspondence or documentation submitted to the government will be handled in accordance with its [Language of Work](https://www.canada.ca/en/privy-council/services/language-policy/official-languages-policy.html). In addition, purchasing documents are available in [PDF format](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/search.ld.variables!?pبواسطة:ssiom FDSSerialization), as follows:

* [English](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/08/94f7d7bebe044934d3176829b779d5b5/rfp_-_w8485-237163b-_eng.pdf)
* Français ([rfp_-_Far.pdf Francis](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/
